程序包 hms.appointments

类 DoctorScheduleManager

java.lang.Object
hms.appointments.DoctorScheduleManager
public class DoctorScheduleManager extends Object
Manages the scheduling of appointments for a doctor.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    DoctorScheduleManager(Doctor doctor)
    Constructs a DoctorScheduleManager for a specified doctor.

    • DoctorScheduleManager

      public DoctorScheduleManager(Doctor doctor)
      Constructs a DoctorScheduleManager for a specified doctor.
      参数:
      doctor - the Doctor object to manage appointments for.

  • 方法详细资料

    • acceptAppointments

      public void acceptAppointments(Appointment appointment)
      Accepts a given appointment if it is pending.
      参数:
      appointment - the Appointment object to accept.

    • declineAppointments

      public void declineAppointments(Appointment appointment)
      Declines a given appointment if it is pending.
      参数:
      appointment - the Appointment object to decline.

    • updateAppointmentOutcomeRecord

      public void updateAppointmentOutcomeRecord(Appointment appointment)
      Updates the appointment outcome record for a given appointment and sets it as complete.
      参数:
      appointment - the Appointment object to update.

    • printPendingSlots

      public void printPendingSlots(Doctor doctor)
      Prints the pending slots for the specified doctor.
      参数:
      doctor - the Doctor object whose pending slots are printed.

    • printUpcomingSlots

      public void printUpcomingSlots(Doctor doctor)
      Prints upcoming slots for the specified doctor.
      参数:
      doctor - the Doctor object whose upcoming slots are printed.

    • isSlotAvailable

      public boolean isSlotAvailable(int time, Date date)
      Checks if a slot is available for the given time and date.
      参数:
      time - the time to check availability for.
      date - the date to check availability for.
      返回:
      true if the slot is available, false otherwise.

    • isSlotAvailable

      public boolean isSlotAvailable(Time time, Date date)
      Checks if a slot is available for the given Time object and date.
      参数:
      time - the Time object to check availability for.
      date - the date to check availability for.
      返回:
      true if the slot is available, false otherwise.

    • getAppointmentsDoctor

      public List<Appointment> getAppointmentsDoctor()
      Retrieves the list of appointments for this doctor.
      返回:
      list of Appointment objects for the doctor.

    • getPendingAppointmentsDoctor

      public List<Appointment> getPendingAppointmentsDoctor()
      Retrieves the list of pending appointments for this doctor.
      返回:
      list of pending Appointment objects for the doctor.

    • updateDoctorData

      public void updateDoctorData()
      Updates the doctor's appointment data for the current instance.

    • getUpcomingAppointment

      public Appointment getUpcomingAppointment(int i)
      Accessor for upcoming appointments.
      参数:
      i - index of appointment
      返回:
      null if index does not exist
